content:
Diagnosis:	Anaplastic astrocytoma, left parietal lobe, IDH-mutant, WHO Grade III

Treatment:	Subtotal resection (2024-11-15)
		Concurrent radiotherapy (54Gy in 30 fractions) and temozolomide completed 2025-01-30
		Maintenance temozolomide (5/28 schedule) completed 2025-06-15

Response:	Initial MRI (2025-02-15): Partial response
		Latest MRI (2025-06-10): Stable disease, no new lesions, minimal residual enhancement, consistent with post-treatment changes

Status:	Performance status improved to ECOG 0
		No new neurological symptoms
		Fatigue resolved

Plan:	Transition to surveillance phase
		Next MRI scheduled for 2025-12-15
		Routine follow-up in neuro-oncology clinic in 6 months
		Advise patient to monitor for new symptoms and report urgently
		Maintain general health with regular exercise and balanced diet
